answers.answer: I've had the same thing! I remember it being worse between 18 and 25w for me. Then I started sleeping through the night believe it or not. And now im back to getting up 3-4 times a night hotter than hot. Im 30w now. Had to step outside last night, couldn't get away from the heat and felt like I was going to pass out!

Phew, glad to know I'm not alone! I like to sleep with no heater on lately and my husband jacks it up to 72 cause it's been about 30ish at night outside (it'll be 23 tonight) so I'm like ahh! It's kind of a catch 22.  If I sleep without covers I get leg cramps bc my legs are cold... But if I sleep with covers I'm sweating up a storm.

I'm 18 weeks, 5 days along, and I'm always thirsty during the night. I try to limit myself with drinking water right before bed because of late night bathroom runs. I try to wear light clothing to bed, no socks, and sleep with a sheet instead of all the covers to keep cool. Good luck to you and baby.

I've had unbelievable unquenchable thirst during my pregnancy! I'm now 33 + 5 and I swear by ice lollies, particularly the vimto ones as they're mega refreshing. Maybe that would help you out? Good luck :) xx
Being overly thirsty may just be temperature, but it could also be sign of gestational diabetes. Speak to your doctor and if suggested, take the blood glucose tests. Better safe than sorry.
I have gd and thats how i feel everytime i get up to go pee i sip on some water and i alway wake up with hot flashes and sweaty

question: I don't know if it is the combination of winter outside and the heater inside but I've been getting up throughout the night really thirsty. I try and limit myself to just one bottle of water during the night bc otherwise I'll be peeing up a storm.I've also been sweating during my sleep.  I'm not sure why.  I assume it's just bc the heater is on and I have to sleep with that giant body pillow.It's kind of weird.
title: So thirsty, hot & sweaty at night!
